problem.markdown:
Q. In DES input, key length ___ bits and plaintext length ____ bits.
( ) 56 bit key length, 64 bit plaintext ( ) 56 bit key length, 120 bit plaintext ( ) 64 bit key length, 120 bit plaintext ( ) 64 bit key length, 64 bit plaintext
Q. DES stands for _________ and AES stands for __________
( ) Data Encryption software, Advanced Encryption Software ( ) Data Encryption Standard, Advanced Encryption Standard ( ) Data Encryption System, Advanced Encryption System ( ) None
Q. DES has an initial and final permutation block and ____ rounds
( ) 14 ( ) 16 ( ) 8 ( ) 12
Q. In DES the length of each round key?
( ) 16 bit ( ) 32 bit ( ) 54 bit ( ) 48 bit
problem.p: Q. In DES input, key length ___ bits and plaintext length ____ bits.
Q. DES stands for _________ and AES stands for __________

choicegroup.choice: Data Encryption software, Advanced Encryption Software
Data Encryption Standard, Advanced Encryption Standard
Data Encryption System, Advanced Encryption System

problem.p: Q. DES has an initial and final permutation block and ____ rounds
Q. In DES the length of each round key?
